issue.title: [CF 1357] Access to icon info from a conditional
issue.body:
When writing conditionals for notifications, I find myself having to duplicate a lot of info from the icon's configuration. For example, if I have an icon tracking the cooldown of an ability, and I want a notification when the cooldown hits a certain value, I have to duplicate the spell info in the conditional. It would be great if there was a way to simply reference info from the icon itself (e.g. timer/cooldown and stacks).


> Posted by CurseForge user eridius | Imported from CurseForge issue #1357 | Raw

comments.body:
This would require a significant amount of work that is very unlikely to happen at this point in the addon's life.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
